Class: Edge

Edge(nodeStart, nodeEnd, id, weightopt)

Private class Edge.

Constructor

new Edge(nodeStart, nodeEnd, id, weightopt)

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
nodeStart Node node which begins the edge.
nodeEnd Node node which terminates the edge.
id any edge's identifier (only string or number).
weight Number <optional>
 1 the edge's weight.
